## Public Member Functions

### canLowerReturn() {#ade4537627ac400052f74edc475906cc6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool X86CallLowering::canLowerReturn (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">CallingConv::ID</a> CallConv, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/basearginfo">BaseArgInfo</a> &gt; &amp; Outs, bool IsVarArg) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to check whether the return values described by <code>Outs</code> can fit into the return registers.

If false is returned, an sret-demotion is performed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-h/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-h">X86CallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-cpp/#l00134">134</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-cpp">X86CallLowering.cpp</a>.

### lowerCall() {#a699fa07bf5290218677fc2a1e69e0781}

<MemberDefinition

### lowerFormalArguments() {#ae22f2d3294d95f6cb262f8732eb0f479}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool X86CallLowering::lowerFormalArguments (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to lower the incoming (formal) arguments, described by <code>VRegs</code>, for GlobalISel.

Each argument must end up in the related virtual registers described by <code>VRegs</code>. In other words, the first argument should end up in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;0&#93;, the second in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;1&#93;, and so on. For each argument, there will be one register for each non-aggregate type, as returned by <code>computeValueLLTs</code>. <code>MIRBuilder</code> is set to the proper insertion for the argument lowering. <code>FLI</code> is required for sret demotion.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeded, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-h">X86CallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-cpp/#l00259">259</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-cpp">X86CallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lowerReturn() {#ace03d9ed2825d1401093a441f164ecdf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool X86CallLowering::lowerReturn (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook behaves as the extended lowerReturn function, but for targets that do not support swifterror value promotion.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-h/#l00029">29</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-h">X86CallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-cpp/#l00143">143</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/gisel/x86calllowering-cpp">X86CallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
